devdoc.details: TokenSale721 is a reworked OZ Crowdsale contract (see Crowdsale.sol). Originall contract was designed to sell ERC20 tokens  This contract is defining rules of token (ERC721Enumerable) sell.  This version of contract suppose to accept ERC20 tokens as a currency (instead of ethereum), and support work with stable-coins as a currency

params.currency: ERC20 token used as a currency
params.tokenAmountToBuy: how much tokens we want to buy by one tx

check_sale_limit(uint256).details: check if sale limit is not exceeded

params.amountToBuy: how much of tokens want to buy

params._currency: ERC20 token used as a currency. If it stable then price is setting equal for all stables.
params._treasure_fund: This is our wallet to collect fees
params.i_sale_limit: How much we want to sell. Should be consistent with rarity type
params.i_wallet: Address where collected funds will be forwarded to
params.sprice: Price for 1 token. (in wei/lowest decimal format)

getWeiAmount(uint256,uint8).details: How much is needed to pay for this token amount to buy

params.tokenAmountToBuy: how much we want to buy

returns._0: weiAmount how much we need to pay, could be zero if wrong currency, but will fail at pre-validation
the address where funds are collected.

withDrawFunds(uint8).details: determine how funds are collected by seller

devdoc.title: TokenSale721
